Description of incident: The US Federal Trade Commission filed a complaint against Aaron's over their practice of monitoring customer activity through software called Detective Mode.  It was determined that customers who rented computers were put at risk for identity theft by Aaron's practice of recording customer keystroke activity, screen shots, and images taken from webcams.  Aaron's may only use tracking technology with the consent of the renter and may not use technology that captures keystrokes, screenshots, images, or sounds on the devices it rents.
